metadata.name: Metro
metadata.description:
狗 跑得飞快
风里挟着女人的衣裳
噼里啪啦坠地
裸露 鸦雀围观
都夸 狗跑得真快

dog runs
wind forces off women’s clothing
down with a beating sound
nudity appears
crows crowd around
commending dog’s fleeing
----
Protoplasm is an AI animation collection that aims to keep memories of women’s plights in China. Here, AI is a mediator and a translator that bridges linguistic information and visual sensories.

Collaborated with the poet Shengji and AI, the artist wants to let images speak the hidden words, and translate the verbal description into a metaphoric expression.

At least 30% of the income will be donated to female charities.
